name: Cybershock: Future Parkour
description:
Cybershock: Future Parkour is a runner game with outrun aesthetics in which you are an antivirus. Your mission is to destroy all the viruses on your computer before they destroy you. For this you must parkour through the different levels and avoid all the obstacles that stand in your way.

  • Frantic level speeds
  • Lot's of crazy mechanics for you to discover
  • Compete with your friends for the best score

Be part of the world of Cybershock: Future Parkour!
